name: activateLinkParamset
description: This method can be used to simulate a remote key press. For most cases setValue should be sufficient. Use "activeLinkParamset" if you want to execute commands only configurable through the link parameter set.
signatures: Void activateLinkParamset(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer remotePeerId, Integer remoteChannel)
Void activateLinkParamset(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer remotePeerId, Integer remoteChannel, Boolean longPress)
deprecatedSignatures: Void activateLinkParamset(String address, String remoteAddress, Boolean longPress)

parameters.name: remotePeerId
parameters.description: The id of a peer linked to the actuator or "0" to use a virtual peer

parameters.name: remoteChannel
parameters.description: The channel of a remote peer linked to the peer. Use the same value "channel" if a virtual peer is specified

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the actuator seperated by colon

parameters.name: remoteAddress
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of a remote peer linked to the peer seperated by colon.

parameters.name: longPress
parameters.description: Set to "true" to simulate a long key press. Default is "false".

errors.description: Peers are not peered to each other
